sentences.sContent: One eyewitness said he saw her talking to a man in a blue car.
sentences.sCn: 一名目击者说他看见她在跟一个坐在蓝色汽车里的男子说话。

sentences.sContent: ...Many factors influence the accuracy of eyewitness testimony...

trans.tranOther: someone who has seen something such as a crime happen, and is able to describe it afterwards
